entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
